summary: A group of divers find themselves in deep trouble with a drug lord after they come upon the illicit cargo of a sunken airplane.
cast: Paul Walker|Jessica Alba|Scott Caan|Ashley Scott|Josh Brolin|James Frain|Tyson Beckford|Dwayne Adway|Javon Frazer|Chris Taloa|Peter R.V. Bowleg Jr.|Clifford McIntosh|Adam Collins|Gill Montie|Dan Ballard|Samantha Lamb|Arthur Thompson Jr.|Ramon Saunders|Stephen Bellot|Leo Quant|John Willinger|Mike Steven Powell|Vonetta Nicola Darling Flowers|Sean Owen Gordon|Lesli Bartlett-Roker|Donna MacKey|Jay Gotlieb|Billy Johnson|Mike Roberts|Gina Marie Knowles|Rana Morrison
title: Inmersión letal
